UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Activity optimization of an undecapeptide analogue derived from a frog-skin antimicrobial peptide
Literature.Author: Won HS, Kang SJ, Choi WS, Lee BJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=50µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=200µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=25µg/ml)
